Name: Angel Juice
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients to emulsify. Add ice, SHAKE again and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Pear and elderflower lead this fruity drink.
History: Created in 2008 by Jay Decker at Paramount, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Angel Juice contains 109 calories
